DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether laser internal urethrotomy ( IU ) efficient cold knife internal urethrotomy treatment anterior urethral stricture regard post operative urination outflow , stricture recurrence rate possible post- operative complication
DOC.brief_title: Efficiency Cold vs. Laser Internal Urethrotomy Treatment Urethral Strictures
DOC.detailed_description: The current surgical treatment anterior urethral stricture include internal urethrotomy ( IU ) cold knife . Recurrence rate procedure quote 35-70 % 2 5 year follow-up . Possible surgical alternative procedure include : open surgical urethral re-construction , urethral stent usage & laser IU . According exist data ( Nd-YAG laser- retrospective ) recurrence rate laser IU far well compare cold knife urethrotomy . The current research intend address question use prospective randomize method .
DOC.criteria: Men 18 year old urethral stricture S/P urethral reconstruction Posterior urethral stricture Children
